sections.heading: General; report conduct; when.If the Inspector General has reason to believe that any public officer or employee has acted in a manner that warrants criminal or disciplinary action or proceedings, the Inspector General shall report the matter to the department or other appropriate authorities

sections.text:
50-1920.Inspector General; report conduct; when.

If the Inspector General has reason to believe that any public officer or employee has acted in a manner that warrants criminal or disciplinary action or proceedings, the Inspector General shall report the matter to the department or other appropriate authorities.

SourceLaws 2025, LB298, ยง 64.Effective Date: June 5, 2025
